Display training

Introduction

The Display training application is an application that introduces users to the graphical system. The application will show how different modules are working together:

  • Graphics display system
  • Graphics drivers
  • Window system
  • Widget toolkit
  • Touch drivers

For the training applications available see Training Applications.
